price: Daabi, wͻn a wͻdi bͻne akyi no di wͻn apεdeε hunu akyi a nimdeε biara nni mu. Enti hwan na ͻbεkyerε obi a Nyankopͻn ayera no no kwan? Saa (nkorͻfoͻ no) nni boafoͻ.
arabic: بَلِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُم بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖۖ فَمَن يَهۡدِي مَنۡ أَضَلَّ ٱللَّهُۖ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: bali ittabaʿa alladhīna ẓalamū ahwāahum bighayri ʿil'min faman yahdī man aḍalla al-lahu wamā lahum min nāṣirīna
